portfoliopage.title: List of My Portfolio
portfoliopage.subtitle: Take a look at some of my best work I put together.

portfolio.name: TIM app - Sales Management
portfolio.description: Realtime sales, warehouse, and finance monitoring management application for companies.

portfolio.name: Lubuk Linggau - Silampari Smart City
portfolio.description:
Silampari Smart City is an official application from the city of Lubuklinggau, which has features including:

1. Citizen Report
2. Sectoral Data Information
3. Public Map
4. CCTV
5. Prices of basic commodities
6. Agenda Information

portfolio.name: Pens Preneur
portfolio.description: Pens Preneur is a website with the topic of entrepreneurship. This site aims to introduce student-owned businesses and convey all information related to entrepreneurship.

portfolio.name: Kalender Pintar Pengasuhan (BKKBN Jawa Timur)
portfolio.description: Aplikasi Kalender Pintar Pengasuhan (Smart Parenting Calendar Application) is a calendar application that is used to improve the abilities and skills of parents in caring for children properly and correctly at 1000 HPK so that children grow and develop optimally.

portfolio.name: E-Buddy
portfolio.description: Added several new features such as Project & Task Management, Integration with SKP Sidoarjo, Protection of pdf file output, and optimization of SQL performance.

portfolio.name: HOME-i
portfolio.description:
The Homei contractor application is a contractor application to make it easier for people to consult in the construction of houses and buildings.
 People can consult directly through the chat in the application.
 
 They can submit a new project and project budget only through the application and the technicians will come to the site to check the site.
 
 One can also hire a small technician to fix or fix a problem at home and the technician will come

portfolio.name: JDIH Kota Blitar
portfolio.description: JDIH Kota Blitar is a system of joint utilization of laws and regulations and other legal documentation materials in an orderly, integrated and sustainable manner and is a means of providing legal information services easily, quickly and accurately.

portfolio.name: Development Dawami Mantan
portfolio.description: Implemented several updates such as cleaned up existing excel export, added excel export in some menus, added a feature to export attendees from old events, and updated database columns. Project based on laravel inertia.

portfolio.name: Mocata
portfolio.description: Mocata is a system developed to monitor a person's body temperature when entering an area. Also accompanied by employee attendance, which can be integrated with the employee payroll system.

portfolio.name: PLN - WANI
portfolio.description: PLN - WANI is the ultimate project management tool. Manage projects, delegate tasks, and collaborate with others people.

portfolio.name: PORTAPP
portfolio.description: PORTAPP (Portfolio APP) is a dynamic portfolio website that can be managed from the backend side.

aboutpage.intro: I'm Defri, a Software Developer based in Surabaya, Indonesia.
aboutpage.description:
Hi there! I was born and raised in Ponorogo, and currenly i'am based on Surabaya, Indonesia.

I'm an experienced developing web using PHP Framework like Yii2, Laravel, and CodeIgniter. I also experienced following code standard community and clean code guide.

I always improve my skills and experience day by day.As Steve Jobs said
